adjective.description: Relating to or characteristic of the Italian region of Campania or its inhabitants.
examples: the bright light and heat of Campanian high summer

adjective.description: Denoting a subdivision of the Late Cretaceous period.

noun.description: A native or inhabitant of the Italian region of Campania.
The Campanian period or the system of rocks deposited during it.
examples: increases in carnivore richness and abundance occurred before the Campanian
